name: places/ChIJ0aKtpAFZwokRNciB4Gi-W5g
formattedAddress: 22 E 41st St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 E 41st St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
Be prepare to wait for hrs to be seen by Dr Mashensky. Even if you have an appointment scheduled for a certain time, you WILL NOT be seen on that time.
I made an appointment for a check up since is close to work. I read some reviews about the wait time but never imagine it would take 2 hrs plus hrs to get seen by the Dr.  At the 2 hrs mark I went o the receptionist to inquire about the wait time and she apologized for the wait and explained that they were having "technical issues  and systems was down " I told her, that I'd only wait 10 more minutes and then I was sent to another waiting room where I was left waiting for another 30 minutes.
I finally was seen by the Dr, who was actually good. She then said that she had a conference in two weeks and that she needed to see all her patients before she left and that is why it was taken her long to see me. No apology was offered or anything.
I do believe she is great a what she does but it is not  worth waiting 2plus hrs.
She told me that I could make an virtual appointment appointment to have my results interpret in 2 weeks. I decided to give her another  chance because she was actually good.
Unfortunately she did again make me wait in a"virtual waiting" room for an hour which I should have expected..but I was there and continue waiting only to have her assistant called me saying that the Dr had"a medical emergency " and that she would call me in 20 minutes.
I gave up and asked that my results be sent to me, but I haven't received them yet.
I do believe Dr Mashensky is a good Dr but, the lack of professionalism when it comes to people's time is disappointing and disrespectful.

They need to either not give that many appointment or hired someone that helps her with her patient.
It's a shame that the customer service was not the greatest.

originalText.text:
Only come if you have PLENTY of time to waste over here.

My appointment was at 1:45pm. And I’ve literally been sitting outside till 5pm to move to the room.

I have no idea how they handle their appointments. If they can’t take that much patients they should arrange less patients per day.

If you are coming to this clinic. Make sure you have at least 4 hours to spend at here.

Doctor herself is good but the waiting time makes it really unworthy.

originalText.text: This was a very unwelcoming environment with disorganized staff, I waited for almost 2 hours just to get blood drawn and the next appointment, they told us that it wouldn't be busy at the time we scheduled yet when we arrived, they told us to leave and come back hours later. They called us once to tell us that we could come back to finally see the doctor and when they called, they claimed they had been calling multiple times but this was not true. They also said that the lab bill was going to be $150-$250 since we did not have insurance but we received a bill for $340. This is an unprofessional office and the doctor was not friendly at all. If you are not Russian, this is not the doctor for you, they will barely speak to you and serve you last.

originalText.text: Dr. Mashensky is the BEST! I had a procedure done in early June of last year and could not be happier with the results. The procedure not only alleviated my back pain, neck pain, and chronic headaches but helped me to lose weight (since I could finally work out again!) and gave me back my self-confidence. She has been incredibly supportive, communicative, and understanding throughout the process and always makes sure that I am totally comfortable. Thank you all for your amazing work!

originalText.text: After I read the reviews and the recommendation of my several close friends I called and scheduled a consultation with Dr. Mashensky. Since I was coming from out of town I hoped, if possible, to begin my treatments during this visit. Dr. Mashensky. It has been less than a week since my treatments and so far I feel like I look better.  The best part is I look like me, just a little softer, brighter and more relaxed. I know it will take a little time for the optimal result but for now, I am very happy.
